scripts.initialize: npm install && npm install -g shx && npm install -g browserify && npm install -g uglify-js
scripts.bundle: npm run compile && node node_modules/shx/lib/cli.js mkdir -p dist && node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js build/main/js-spec.js -s js-spec -o dist/js-spec.js
scripts.minimize: npm run bundle && node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs dist/js-spec.js -o dist/js-spec.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.compress: npm run minimize && ngzip -9 dist/js-spec.min.js > dist/js-spec.min.js.gz
scripts.docs: node node_modules/shx/lib/cli.js rm -rf ./dist/docs && cross-conf-env typedoc --options typedoc.json src/main/api/ -name "js-spec vnpm_package_version"
scripts.all: npm run compress && npm run test && npm run docs && node node_modules/shx/lib/cli.js echo Finished successfully.
